author: veithen
msg: Removed unused imports, in particular one that causes a build failure.

author: veithen
msg: Use project.version instead of pom.version (which will be deprecated in Maven 3).

author: veithen
msg: * Use Maven dependencies for the Axis2 modules and services that are included in the WAR.
* Use the new axis2-repo-maven-plugin to build the Axis2 repository, including the modules.list and services.list files.
* Use packagingExcludes instead of transitive dependency exclusions (i.e. use an approach similar to the binary distribution). This simplifies the POM and makes it easier to understand.
* Add the JavaMail and JAF dependencies.
* Enable the use of maven-jetty-plugin to test the webapp.
